title: Sunny
lyrics:
[intro] (Em7)
 
(Em7)Sunny, (G) yesterday my (C)life was filled with (Gbm) rain (B7)
(Em7)Sunny, (G) you smiled at me and (C)really eased the (Gbm)pain (B7)
Now the (Em7)dark days are done and the (G)bright days are near
(C)My sunny one shines (F)so sincere
(Gbm)Sunny, one so (B7)true
I love (Em)you (Em)
      
(Em7)Sunny, (G) thank you for the (C)sunshine bou(Gbm)quet (B7)
(Em7)Sunny, (G) thank you for the (C)love you brought my (Gbm)way (B7)
You (Em7)gave to me your (G)all and all
And (C)now I feel (F)ten feet tall
(Gbm)Sunny, one so (B7)true
I love (Em)you (C7)
 
(Fm)Sunny, (Ab7) thank you for the (Db)truth you let me (Gm7)see (C7)
(Fm)Sunny, (Ab7) thank you for the (Db)facts from A to (Gm7)Z (C7)
(Fm)My life was torn like-a (Ab7)windblown sand, then
a (Db)rock was formed when (Gb)we held hands
(Gm7)Sunny, one so (C7)true
I love (Fm)you (Db7)
 
(Gbm)Sunny, (A7) thank you for that (D)smile upon your (Abm7)face (Db7)
(Gbm)Sunny, (A7) thank you for that (D)gleam that flows from (Abm7)grace (Db7)
(Gbm)You're my spark of (A7)nature's fire
(D)You're my sweet com(G7)plete desire
(Abm7)Sunny, one so (Db7)true
I love (Gbm)you (D7)
 
(Gm)Sunny, (Bb7) yesterday all my (Eb)life was filled with (Am7)rain (D7)
(Gm)Sunny, (Bb7) you smiled at me and (Eb)really really eased the (Am7)pain (D7)
Now the (Gm)dark days are done and the (Bb7)bright days are near
(Eb)My sunny one shines (Ab7)so sincere
(Am7)Sunny, one so (D7)true
I love (Gm)you (Cm)
(D7)I love (Gm)you (Cm)
(D7)I love (Gm)you (Cm)
(D7)I love (Gm-tremolo)you [end]
